item.title: Master Mind Solver
item.description: The mastermind game is a board game which opposes a code maker and a code breaker. The code maker will have to come up with a random sequence of colors, and the code breaker will have to try and find it. At every attempt, the code maker will have to give feedback to the code breaker. My objective was to build an effective and non-time consuming solver. I have done so using Genetic Algorithm coded in C++
